leaf_cluster.leaf_cluster_name: 药物发现-ADMET/性质预测与分子优化生态
leaf_cluster.task_chain: 标准化→预测→优化→UQ/解释→评测
leaf_cluster.tool_form: QSAR/生成工具 + 评测基准

queries: [WEB] molecular property prediction deep learning github

tools.name: Aldy
tools.one_line_profile: Allelic decomposition and exact genotyping of highly polymorphic genes
tools.detailed_description: Aldy is a tool for allelic decomposition and exact genotyping of highly polymorphic and structurally variant genes, particularly useful in pharmacogenomics and immunogenomics.

tools.name: OpenRXN
tools.one_line_profile: Modeling chemical reaction networks
tools.detailed_description: OpenRXN is a free, open-source tool for modeling chemical reaction networks, allowing users to simulate and analyze complex chemical kinetics and pathways.

tools.name: BCL
tools.one_line_profile: The Biochemical Library for cheminformatics and QSAR modeling
tools.detailed_description: The Biochemical Library (BCL) is a toolkit that integrates traditional small molecule cheminformatics tools with machine learning-based quantitative structure-activity/property relationship (QSAR/QSPR) modeling for computer-aided drug discovery.

tools.name: QSPRpred
tools.one_line_profile: Tool for creating QSPR/QSAR models
tools.detailed_description: QSPRpred is a tool designed for creating, training, and evaluating Quantitative Structure-Property/Activity Relationship (QSPR/QSAR) models, facilitating molecular property prediction.

tools.name: SMILES-enumeration
tools.one_line_profile: SMILES enumeration for QSAR modelling
tools.detailed_description: A Python library for SMILES enumeration, used to augment datasets for QSAR modeling and deep learning applications in chemistry, particularly with LSTM networks.

tools.name: GNEprop
tools.one_line_profile: Antibacterial activity prediction model
tools.detailed_description: GNEprop is a graph neural network-based model developed by Genentech to predict antibacterial activity from molecular structures, specifically designed for virtual screening settings.

tools.name: PKPy
tools.one_line_profile: Python-based framework for automated population pharmacokinetic analysis
tools.detailed_description: A Python-based framework designed for automated population pharmacokinetic (PopPK) analysis, facilitating the modeling of drug concentration over time in populations.

tools.name: GS-Meta
tools.one_line_profile: Graph sampling-based meta-learning for molecular property prediction
tools.detailed_description: Implementation of a graph sampling-based meta-learning approach for predicting molecular properties, designed to handle few-shot learning scenarios in drug discovery.

tools.name: RxClassAPIWrapper
tools.one_line_profile: Python wrapper for RxClass API to retrieve drug class and pharmacology data
tools.detailed_description: A helper library to interact with the RxClass API, enabling the retrieval of drug indications, contraindications, pharmacology, pharmacokinetics, and mechanisms of action.

tools.name: PKPDsim
tools.one_line_profile: Simulation of pharmacokinetic-pharmacodynamic (PK-PD) models
tools.detailed_description: An R package to simulate pharmacokinetic-pharmacodynamic (PK-PD) models defined as systems of ordinary differential equations (ODEs).

tools.name: clinPK
tools.one_line_profile: Equations and tools for clinical pharmacokinetics
tools.detailed_description: An R package providing a collection of equations and tools specifically for clinical pharmacokinetics calculations and analysis.

tools.name: Molecular_VAE_Pytorch
tools.one_line_profile: PyTorch implementation of Molecular VAE for chemical design
tools.detailed_description: A PyTorch implementation of a Variational Autoencoder (VAE) for converting discrete molecular representations into a continuous latent space for automatic chemical design.

tools.name: chemprop_transfer
tools.one_line_profile: Transfer learning tools for Chemprop
tools.detailed_description: A package that extends Chemprop to facilitate transfer learning workflows for molecular property prediction.

tools.name: fastprop
tools.one_line_profile: Fast molecular property prediction using mordred descriptors
tools.detailed_description: A tool for rapid molecular property prediction that leverages mordredcommunity for descriptor calculation.

tools.name: MGNN
tools.one_line_profile: Moment Graph Neural Network for molecular potentials
tools.detailed_description: Implementation of Moment Graph Neural Network (MGNN) for learning universal molecular potentials and properties.

tools.name: ADMET-PrInt
tools.one_line_profile: Evaluation and interpretation of ADMET properties
tools.detailed_description: A tool for the prediction, interpretation, and optimization of physicochemical and ADMET properties in drug design.

tools.name: qsar-models
tools.one_line_profile: Data and regression models for QSAR analysis
tools.detailed_description: A repository containing datasets and regression models specifically for Quantitative Structure-Activity Relationship (QSAR) studies.

tools.name: GraphCW
tools.one_line_profile: Self-interpretable Graph Neural Network for molecular property prediction
tools.detailed_description: A self-interpretable Graph Neural Network (GNN) using Concept Whitening for explainable molecular property prediction in drug discovery.

tools.name: Antibiotics_Chemprop
tools.one_line_profile: Antibiotic discovery using Chemprop
tools.detailed_description: A project applying Chemprop's graph deep learning capabilities specifically for the discovery of new antibiotics.

tools.name: ADMET-AGI
tools.one_line_profile: AI agent for automated ADMET prediction
tools.detailed_description: An artificial intelligence agent capable of using cognitive reasoning to automate ADMET prediction tasks in drug discovery.

tools.name: 3D-PGT
tools.one_line_profile: Automated 3D pre-training for molecular property prediction
tools.detailed_description: A framework for automated 3D pre-training of models to improve molecular property prediction tasks.

tools.name: ABT-MPNN
tools.one_line_profile: Atom-bond transformer-based MPNN for molecular property prediction
tools.detailed_description: An Atom-Bond Transformer-based Message Passing Neural Network (ABT-MPNN) designed for accurate molecular property prediction.

tools.name: automated-qsar-framework
tools.one_line_profile: Automated framework for QSAR model development
tools.detailed_description: An automated framework for chemogenomics data curation and QSAR model development for virtual screening, utilizing KNIME.

tools.name: chemexp
tools.one_line_profile: Explainer for Chemprop models
tools.detailed_description: A tool for explaining predictions made by Chemprop models, utilizing LIME and PathExplain techniques.

tools.name: SevenNet
tools.one_line_profile: Graph neural network interatomic potential package
tools.detailed_description: A graph neural network-based interatomic potential package supporting efficient multi-GPU parallel molecular dynamics simulations.

tools.name: OpenChem
tools.one_line_profile: Deep learning toolkit for computational chemistry
tools.detailed_description: A deep learning toolkit designed for computational chemistry and drug design research, supporting various molecular models.

tools.name: QSAR-activity-cliff-experiments
tools.one_line_profile: QSAR models for activity-cliff prediction
tools.detailed_description: A repository exploring and implementing QSAR models specifically for the prediction of activity cliffs in molecular datasets.

tools.name: ProQSAR
tools.one_line_profile: QSAR modeling tool
tools.detailed_description: A Python-based tool for Quantitative Structure-Activity Relationship (QSAR) modeling.

tools.name: MolPROP
tools.one_line_profile: Molecular property prediction fusing language and graph representations
tools.detailed_description: A molecular property prediction tool that fuses molecular language models and graph representations for improved accuracy.

tools.name: GraphINVENT
tools.one_line_profile: Graph neural networks for molecular design
tools.detailed_description: A platform using graph neural networks for graph-based molecular generation and design.

tools.name: smiles-featurizers
tools.one_line_profile: Extract Molecular SMILES embeddings from language models
tools.detailed_description: A library to extract molecular embeddings from SMILES strings using pre-trained language models, useful for downstream property prediction tasks.

tools.name: PoseidonQ
tools.one_line_profile: AI/ML Based QSAR Modeling and WebApp Translation
tools.detailed_description: A tool for developing AI/ML-based QSAR models and translating them into deployable web applications.

tools.name: drug-molecular-toxicity-predictor
tools.one_line_profile: CNN-based molecular toxicity predictor
tools.detailed_description: A Python project using Convolutional Neural Networks (CNN) to predict chemical toxicity based on molecular structures represented as SMILES.

tools.name: S-CGIB
tools.one_line_profile: Subgraph-conditioned Graph Information Bottleneck for GNN pre-training
tools.detailed_description: A novel architecture for pre-training Graph Neural Networks in molecular property prediction using Subgraph-conditioned Graph Information Bottleneck.

tools.name: KERMT
tools.one_line_profile: Pretrained GNN model for molecular property prediction
tools.detailed_description: A pretrained graph neural network model specifically designed for molecular property prediction tasks.

tools.name: cuik-molmaker
tools.one_line_profile: Molecular featurization package for GNNs
tools.detailed_description: A specialized package for converting chemical structures into features suitable for deep learning models, particularly Graph Neural Networks.

tools.name: Multimodal-GNN-for-Cancer-Subtype-Clasification
tools.one_line_profile: Multimodal GNN for cancer molecular subtype classification
tools.detailed_description: A framework using multimodal Graph Neural Networks to classify cancer molecular subtypes.

tools.name: mod-qsar
tools.one_line_profile: Modular inverse QSAR pipeline
tools.detailed_description: A modular pipeline for inverse Quantitative Structure-Activity Relationship (QSAR) modeling.

tools.name: DeepCt
tools.one_line_profile: Deep learning for pharmacokinetic compartmental modeling
tools.detailed_description: A tool for predicting pharmacokinetic compartmental models and concentration-time curves from chemical structure using deep learning.

tools.name: pQSAR
tools.one_line_profile: Massively multitask stacked model for activity prediction
tools.detailed_description: A massively multitask stacked model designed to predict the activity of thousands of biological assays simultaneously.

tools.name: PK-Sim
tools.one_line_profile: Whole-body physiologically based pharmacokinetic modeling tool
tools.detailed_description: A comprehensive software tool for whole-body physiologically based pharmacokinetic (PBPK) modeling.

tools.name: Pregnancy-Models
tools.one_line_profile: PBPK models for pregnant women
tools.detailed_description: Physiologically Based Pharmacokinetic (PBPK) models specifically designed for simulating pharmacokinetics in pregnant women.

tools.name: openadmet-models
tools.one_line_profile: Machine learning workflows for OpenADMET
tools.detailed_description: A collection of machine learning workflows and models developed for the OpenADMET project to predict ADMET properties.

tools.name: PKDocClassifier
tools.one_line_profile: Binary classifier for identifying scientific publications with in vivo pharmacokinetic parameters
tools.detailed_description: A machine learning tool designed to filter and identify scientific literature that reports in vivo pharmacokinetic (PK) parameters, aiding in data curation and database construction.

tools.name: DeepDelta
tools.one_line_profile: Deep learning approach for predicting molecular property differences
tools.detailed_description: A pairwise deep learning framework based on Chemprop that processes two molecules simultaneously to predict the difference in their properties, useful for molecular optimization and activity cliff analysis.

tools.name: PKPD
tools.one_line_profile: Graphical pharmacokinetic-pharmacodynamic modelling solution
tools.detailed_description: A simple, graphical tool for pharmacokinetic-pharmacodynamic (PK/PD) modeling, developed by SABS-R3 (Oxford CDT).

tools.name: uq_molecule
tools.one_line_profile: Uncertainty quantification for molecular property prediction
tools.detailed_description: A library for uncertainty quantification in molecular property prediction using Bayesian deep learning techniques, enabling more reliable ADMET predictions.

tools.name: stanpumpR
tools.one_line_profile: PK/PD simulation program in R
tools.detailed_description: An R package for pharmacokinetic/pharmacodynamic (PK/PD) simulation, developed by domain experts for modeling drug concentration and effect over time.

tools.name: MolEnc
tools.one_line_profile: Molecular encoder and fingerprinting tool
tools.detailed_description: A molecular encoder and fingerprinting tool implemented in OCaml using RDKit, designed for efficient chemical representation in machine learning pipelines.

tools.name: estrannaise.js
tools.one_line_profile: Interactive playground for estradiol pharmacokinetics simulation
tools.detailed_description: A JavaScript-based simulation tool for modeling estradiol pharmacokinetics, allowing users to visualize hormone levels over time based on different dosage protocols.

tools.name: GeminiMol
tools.one_line_profile: Molecular representation learning incorporating conformational space profiles
tools.detailed_description: A tool for molecular representation learning that integrates conformational space profiles to enhance applications in drug discovery, such as virtual screening, target identification, and QSAR modeling.

tools.name: HM-GNN
tools.one_line_profile: Molecular representation learning via Heterogeneous Motif Graph Neural Networks
tools.detailed_description: An implementation of Heterogeneous Motif Graph Neural Networks (HM-GNN) for learning molecular representations, useful for property prediction tasks.

tools.name: FraGAT
tools.one_line_profile: Fragment-oriented multi-scale graph attention model for molecular property prediction
tools.detailed_description: A deep learning model utilizing fragment-oriented multi-scale graph attention mechanisms to predict molecular properties with high accuracy.

tools.name: chemprop
tools.one_line_profile: Uncertainty quantification and accelerated optimization for molecular property prediction
tools.detailed_description: A library for molecular property prediction that emphasizes fast and scalable uncertainty quantification, accelerated optimization, and guided virtual screening using neural networks.

tools.name: ADMeshGUI
tools.one_line_profile: GUI for ADMesh STL viewer and manipulation tool
tools.detailed_description: A graphical user interface for ADMesh, facilitating the viewing, processing, and repairing of triangulated solid meshes (STL files) used in engineering and manufacturing.

tools.name: admesh
tools.one_line_profile: CLI and C library for processing triangulated solid meshes
tools.detailed_description: A command-line utility and C library for processing, repairing, and manipulating triangulated solid meshes (STL files), widely used in 3D printing and computational geometry.

tools.name: GeomGCL
tools.one_line_profile: Geometric Graph Contrastive Learning for Molecular Property Prediction
tools.detailed_description: Implementation of Geometric Graph Contrastive Learning (GeomGCL) for enhancing molecular property prediction by leveraging geometric information in molecular graphs.

tools.name: molgraph
tools.one_line_profile: Graph neural networks for molecular machine learning in TensorFlow/Keras
tools.detailed_description: A Python library implementing Graph Neural Networks (GNNs) for molecular machine learning, designed to be compatible with TensorFlow and Keras ecosystems.

tools.name: PopED
tools.one_line_profile: Population Experimental Design in R
tools.detailed_description: An R package for Population Experimental Design (PopED), assisting in the optimal design of pharmacokinetic and pharmacodynamic experiments.

tools.name: Drug3D-Net
tools.one_line_profile: Spatial-temporal Gated Attention Module for Molecular Property Prediction
tools.detailed_description: A deep learning framework incorporating a Spatial-temporal Gated Attention Module to predict molecular properties based on molecular geometry.

tools.name: MCGLPPI
tools.one_line_profile: Molecular coarse-grained model for protein-protein complex property prediction
tools.detailed_description: A tool integrating molecular coarse-grained models into a geometric representation learning framework for predicting properties of protein-protein complexes.

tools.name: ChemXploreML
tools.one_line_profile: Machine learning desktop application for molecular property prediction
tools.detailed_description: A desktop application that provides a user-friendly interface for machine learning-based molecular property prediction and analysis.

tools.name: transformer-cnn
tools.one_line_profile: Transformer CNN architecture for QSAR/QSPR modelling
tools.detailed_description: A deep learning framework combining Transformer and CNN architectures specifically designed for QSAR (Quantitative Structure-Activity Relationship) and QSPR modeling.

tools.name: MolRep
tools.one_line_profile: Deep Representation Learning Library for Molecular Property Prediction
tools.detailed_description: A comprehensive library for deep molecular representation learning, offering various models and methods for predicting molecular properties.

tools.name: pysb-pkpd
tools.one_line_profile: PySB extension for empirical and mechanistic PK/PD modeling
tools.detailed_description: A domain-specific add-on for the PySB systems biology framework that provides macros and models specifically for Pharmacokinetic/Pharmacodynamic (PK/PD) modeling, facilitating the creation of compartmental models.

tools.name: dataTools
tools.one_line_profile: Data preparation tools for NONMEM PK/PD modeling
tools.detailed_description: A set of R tools designed to assist in the creation and formatting of datasets for use with NONMEM, the standard software for population pharmacokinetic/pharmacodynamic modeling.

tools.name: GraphMVP
tools.one_line_profile: Pre-training framework for molecular graph representation with 3D geometry
tools.detailed_description: A framework for pre-training molecular graph representations by incorporating 3D geometric information, serving as a foundation model for downstream molecular property prediction tasks.

tools.name: qcf
tools.one_line_profile: Quantum computing simulation toolbox for MATLAB/Octave
tools.detailed_description: A toolbox for simulating quantum computing algorithms and functions, based on the syntax of Nielsen & Chuang's standard text, enabling research and education in quantum information science.

tools.name: Chemprop
tools.one_line_profile: Message Passing Neural Networks for molecular property prediction
tools.detailed_description: A comprehensive library for training and evaluating Message Passing Neural Networks (MPNNs) for molecular property prediction, widely used as a baseline and production tool in drug discovery.

tools.name: chemprop-contrib
tools.one_line_profile: Community extensions for the Chemprop library
tools.detailed_description: A repository of community-contributed extensions, models, and features that augment the core Chemprop library for specialized molecular machine learning tasks.

tools.name: ADMESH
tools.one_line_profile: Automatic unstructured simplex mesh generator
tools.detailed_description: A MATLAB-based tool for generating automatic, unstructured simplex meshes, which are essential for finite element analysis and other numerical simulations in scientific computing.

tools.name: TreeExtra
tools.one_line_profile: Additive Groves and bagged trees library for interaction detection
tools.detailed_description: A C++ library implementing Additive Groves and Bagged Trees with features for feature evaluation and interaction detection, often used in QSAR and bioinformatics for interpreting complex models.

tools.name: admetica
tools.one_line_profile: ADMET property evaluation plugin for Datagrok
tools.detailed_description: A repository containing tools and scripts for evaluating ADMET (Absorption, Distribution, Metabolism, Excretion, and Toxicity) properties within the Datagrok platform environment.

tools.name: DeepChem
tools.one_line_profile: Deep learning library for drug discovery and life sciences
tools.detailed_description: A robust Python library that democratizes deep learning for science, providing a comprehensive suite of tools for molecular machine learning, quantum chemistry, materials science, and biology.

tools.name: deepchem-gui
tools.one_line_profile: Web-based graphical user interface for DeepChem
tools.detailed_description: A graphical user interface designed to make the DeepChem library accessible via a web browser, facilitating no-code or low-code interaction with deep learning models for drug discovery.

tools.name: MoleculeNet
tools.one_line_profile: Benchmark datasets and loaders for molecular machine learning
tools.detailed_description: A collection of benchmark datasets and splitting mechanisms for molecular machine learning, provided as a library to facilitate the development and evaluation of molecular property prediction models.

tools.name: qsar-tools
tools.one_line_profile: Scripts for QSAR modeling and 2D chemical data processing
tools.detailed_description: A collection of Python scripts and utilities for processing 2D chemical data and assisting in the development of Quantitative Structure-Activity Relationship (QSAR) models.

tools.name: Peptides
tools.one_line_profile: R package for peptide property calculation
tools.detailed_description: An R package designed to calculate various physicochemical properties and indices of peptides and protein sequences, useful for proteomics and peptide drug discovery.

tools.name: PKPDdatasets
tools.one_line_profile: R package providing PK/PD datasets for pharmacometrics
tools.detailed_description: An R package that provides a collection of pharmacokinetic and pharmacodynamic datasets, structured for use in pharmacometrics education, research, and model development.

tools.name: Zaira Chem
tools.one_line_profile: Automated QSAR modeling tool based on multiple small molecule descriptors
tools.detailed_description: A Python library for automated Quantitative Structure-Activity Relationship (QSAR) modeling. It facilitates the generation of predictive models for small molecules using various molecular descriptors, designed to be integrated into the Ersilia Model Hub ecosystem.

tools.name: neural_fingerprints_tf
tools.one_line_profile: TensorFlow implementation of Graph Convolutional Networks for molecular fingerprints
tools.detailed_description: A library implementing Convolutional Networks on Graphs for Learning Molecular Fingerprints (Duvenaud et al.), allowing users to generate differentiable molecular fingerprints for downstream machine learning tasks.

tools.name: PKNCA
tools.one_line_profile: R package for pharmacokinetic noncompartmental analysis
tools.detailed_description: A comprehensive R package designed to perform noncompartmental analysis (NCA) calculations for pharmacokinetic (PK) data, widely used for analyzing drug concentration-time profiles.

tools.name: ADMETlab
tools.one_line_profile: Platform for systematic ADME evaluation of drug molecules
tools.detailed_description: A comprehensive platform and codebase for evaluating Absorption, Distribution, Metabolism, Excretion, and Toxicity (ADMET) properties of drug candidates to accelerate drug discovery.

tools.name: adme-pred-py
tools.one_line_profile: Python implementation of common ADME property calculations
tools.detailed_description: A Python library providing implementations for calculating common ADME (Absorption, Distribution, Metabolism, Excretion) properties, useful for initial screening in drug discovery.

tools.name: ReLeaSE
tools.one_line_profile: Deep Reinforcement Learning for de-novo Drug Design
tools.detailed_description: Reinforcement Learning for Structural Evolution (ReLeaSE) is a deep learning framework for de novo drug design, capable of generating novel chemical structures with desired physical and biological properties.

tools.name: CToxPred
tools.one_line_profile: Cardiotoxicity prediction tool for small molecules
tools.detailed_description: A tool for predicting cardiotoxicity of small molecules against three major targets: hERG, Nav1.5, and Cav1.2, aiding in the safety assessment of drug candidates.

tools.name: pyg_chemprop
tools.one_line_profile: PyTorch Geometric implementation of ChemProp
tools.detailed_description: A concise and customizable reimplementation of the ChemProp message passing neural network architecture using PyTorch Geometric, facilitating molecular property prediction.

tools.name: pyADA
tools.one_line_profile: Applicability Domain analysis tool for molecular fingerprints
tools.detailed_description: A cheminformatics package to perform Applicability Domain (AD) analysis of molecular fingerprints based on similarity calculations, useful for assessing the reliability of QSAR model predictions.

tools.name: pmxTools
tools.one_line_profile: Pharmacometric tools for modeling and simulation in R
tools.detailed_description: An R package providing various tools and functions to support pharmacometric modeling and simulation tasks, including data manipulation and visualization for PK/PD analysis.

tools.name: DeepPurpose
tools.one_line_profile: Deep learning toolkit for drug-target interaction and property prediction
tools.detailed_description: A comprehensive Deep Learning toolkit for Drug-Target Interaction (DTI) prediction, Drug Property prediction, Protein-Protein Interaction (PPI) prediction, and Drug-Drug Interaction (DDI) prediction, offering a unified interface for various models.

tools.name: OPERA
tools.one_line_profile: Open-source QSAR model suite for physicochemical and toxicity prediction
tools.detailed_description: OPERA (Open-source Property Estimation and Risk Assessment) is a comprehensive suite of QSAR models providing predictions for physicochemical properties, environmental fate, and toxicological endpoints. It includes applicability domain assessment and accuracy estimation.

tools.name: QSAR-ready
tools.one_line_profile: Standardization workflow for preparing chemical structures for QSAR modeling
tools.detailed_description: A workflow for the standardization and pre-treatment of chemical structures to generate 'QSAR-ready' files. It handles cleaning, salt removal, and normalization to ensure high-quality input for molecular modeling.

tools.name: torch-molecule
tools.one_line_profile: Deep learning library for molecular property prediction and representation learning
tools.detailed_description: A PyTorch-based deep learning package designed for molecular discovery. It offers an sklearn-style interface for tasks such as molecular property prediction, inverse design, and representation learning.

tools.name: GenUI Backend
tools.one_line_profile: Backend services for molecular generation and QSAR modeling
tools.detailed_description: The backend component of the GenUI framework, providing REST APIs for molecular generation, QSAR modeling, and chemical space visualization. It serves as the computational engine for the GenUI platform.

tools.name: molecularGNN_3Dstructure
tools.one_line_profile: Graph Neural Network for molecular property prediction using 3D structures
tools.detailed_description: A Graph Neural Network (GNN) implementation specifically designed for predicting molecular properties based on 3D structural information. It serves as a robust baseline and tool for structure-based property prediction.

tools.name: molecularGNN_smiles
tools.one_line_profile: GNN for molecular property prediction based on subgraph fingerprints
tools.detailed_description: A Graph Neural Network implementation for molecules that learns representations of r-radius subgraphs (fingerprints) directly from SMILES/graph data for property prediction tasks.

tools.name: pkdb
tools.one_line_profile: Python interface and curation tools for a pharmacokinetics database
tools.detailed_description: A Python package and database framework for storing, curating, and retrieving pharmacokinetics (PK) data. It supports the management of clinical and preclinical PK studies.

tools.name: CLAMP
tools.one_line_profile: Language-guided molecular activity prediction model
tools.detailed_description: CLAMP (Contrastive Language-Assisted Molecular Pre-training) enhances activity prediction models in drug discovery by leveraging natural language descriptions. It allows for few-shot learning and better generalization in assay prediction.

tools.name: logd74-dataset
tools.one_line_profile: Curated dataset of logD7.4 values for 1,130 compounds
tools.detailed_description: A high-quality, hand-curated dataset containing logD7.4 (distribution coefficient at pH 7.4) values for 1,130 chemical compounds, useful for benchmarking ADMET prediction models.

tools.name: ADME@NCATS
tools.one_line_profile: Source code for NCATS ADME prediction models and application
tools.detailed_description: The source code repository for the ADME@NCATS application, hosting various prediction models for ADME (Absorption, Distribution, Metabolism, Excretion) properties developed by the National Center for Advancing Translational Sciences.

tools.name: RL-GraphINVENT
tools.one_line_profile: Graph-based reinforcement learning platform for molecular generation
tools.detailed_description: A platform for targeted molecular generation using Graph Neural Networks (GNN) and Reinforcement Learning (RL). It generates new molecules with optimized property profiles by fine-tuning a generative model.

tools.name: Sterimol
tools.one_line_profile: Program to calculate Sterimol steric parameters from molecular structures
tools.detailed_description: A Python program that calculates Sterimol parameters (L, B1, B5) which are essential steric descriptors in computational organic chemistry and QSAR modeling. It processes structure input files to quantify the spatial dimensions of substituents.

tools.name: wSterimol
tools.one_line_profile: Generator for Boltzmann-weighted Sterimol steric parameters
tools.detailed_description: A tool designed to generate Boltzmann-weighted Sterimol parameters for conformationally flexible substituents. It accounts for the dynamic nature of molecules by weighting steric parameters across multiple conformers.

tools.name: aNCA
tools.one_line_profile: Shiny App for Non-Compartmental Analysis (NCA) of clinical data
tools.detailed_description: Part of the Pharmaverse ecosystem, this tool provides an R Shiny interface to perform Non-Compartmental Analysis (NCA) on pre-clinical and clinical pharmacokinetic data, facilitating standard PK parameter estimation.

tools.name: flame
tools.one_line_profile: Modeling framework for the eTRANSAFE toxicity prediction project
tools.detailed_description: A Python modeling framework developed for the eTRANSAFE project, designed to build, validate, and manage predictive models for drug safety and toxicity assessment.

tools.name: FragNet
tools.one_line_profile: Graph Neural Network for interpretable molecular property prediction
tools.detailed_description: A deep learning model developed by PNNL that utilizes a fragment-based graph neural network approach to predict molecular properties with a focus on interpretability.

tools.name: mol_dgnn
tools.one_line_profile: Molecular Dynamic Graph Neural Network implementation
tools.detailed_description: A PNNL-developed implementation of Dynamic Graph Neural Networks tailored for molecular data, enabling advanced property prediction tasks.

tools.name: eToxPred
tools.one_line_profile: Predictor for general toxicity and synthetic accessibility
tools.detailed_description: A computational tool designed to predict the general toxicity of small molecules and calculate their synthetic accessibility (SA) scores, aiding in the filtering of drug candidates.

tools.name: GNNImplicitSolvent
tools.one_line_profile: Implicit solvent model based on GNNs for Molecular Dynamics
tools.detailed_description: A tool from Riniker Lab that implements a Generalized Born implicit solvent model using Transferable Graph Neural Networks, designed to accelerate Molecular Dynamics simulations.

tools.name: ACANet
tools.one_line_profile: Activity-Cliff Awareness Graph Learning for Molecular Property Prediction
tools.detailed_description: A deep learning model that incorporates activity-cliff awareness to improve the robustness of graph learning for molecular property prediction tasks.

tools.name: ChemBench
tools.one_line_profile: Benchmark datasets for molecular machine learning
tools.detailed_description: A repository providing benchmark datasets (MoleculeNet & MolMapNet) to evaluate machine learning models in chemistry and drug discovery.

tools.name: HMGNN
tools.one_line_profile: Heterogeneous Molecular Graph Neural Network
tools.detailed_description: An implementation of a Heterogeneous Molecular Graph Neural Network for learning molecular representations and predicting properties.

tools.name: openDMPK
tools.one_line_profile: Open source toolkit for DMPK property prediction
tools.detailed_description: A toolkit and data resource for predicting Drug Metabolism and Pharmacokinetics (DMPK) properties of small molecules, aiding in lead optimization.

tools.name: ADMET_XGBoost
tools.one_line_profile: XGBoost-based models for accurate ADMET prediction
tools.detailed_description: A repository providing XGBoost models optimized for predicting various ADMET properties, offering a robust machine learning approach for drug property assessment.

tools.name: admet_ai
tools.one_line_profile: Platform for ADMET prediction using Chemprop
tools.detailed_description: A comprehensive tool and web interface for predicting ADMET properties using Chemprop models. It allows users to train new models or use pre-trained ones for drug discovery.

tools.name: PAR-NeurIPS21
tools.one_line_profile: Property-Aware Relation Networks for few-shot molecular property prediction
tools.detailed_description: Implementation of Property-Aware Relation Networks (PAR) designed for few-shot molecular property prediction tasks, as presented at NeurIPS 2021.

tools.name: GROVER
tools.one_line_profile: Self-supervised graph transformer for molecular representation and property prediction
tools.detailed_description: A PyTorch implementation of GROVER (Graph Representation from self-supervised Message Passing Transformer), a large-scale pre-trained model for molecular representation learning and property prediction.

tools.name: openNCA
tools.one_line_profile: R package for non-compartmental pharmacokinetic analysis
tools.detailed_description: A computation engine provided as an R package for generating pharmacokinetic parameter estimates using non-compartmental analysis (NCA) methods.

tools.name: transkit
tools.one_line_profile: Pharmacokinetic simulation tools for hormone therapy
tools.detailed_description: A set of pharmacokinetic tools and Jupyter notebooks designed for simulating and analyzing transgender hormone therapy regimens.

tools.name: nlmixr2autoinit
tools.one_line_profile: Automated initial estimates for population PK modeling
tools.detailed_description: An R package for the automatic generation of initial estimates for population pharmacokinetic modelling, developed by UCL Pharmacometrics.

tools.name: soapgp
tools.one_line_profile: Molecular property prediction using Gaussian Processes with SOAP kernel
tools.detailed_description: A Python implementation for predicting molecular properties using Gaussian Processes (GP) combined with the Smooth Overlap of Atomic Positions (SOAP) kernel.

tools.name: Knowledge-based-BERT
tools.one_line_profile: K-BERT model for molecular property prediction
tools.detailed_description: Implementation of Knowledge-based BERT (K-BERT) adapted for molecular property prediction tasks.

tools.name: MolCLR
tools.one_line_profile: Molecular Contrastive Learning of Representations via GNNs
tools.detailed_description: PyTorch Geometric implementation of MolCLR, a framework for molecular contrastive learning of representations using Graph Neural Networks for downstream property prediction.

tools.name: GLAM
tools.one_line_profile: Adaptive graph learning for molecular interactions and properties
tools.detailed_description: Implementation of GLAM (Graph Learning with Adaptive Mechanisms) for automated molecular interactions and properties predictions.

tools.name: MGSSL
tools.one_line_profile: Motif-based Graph Self-Supervised Learning for molecules
tools.detailed_description: Official implementation of the NeurIPS'21 paper 'Motif-based Graph Self-Supervised Learning for Molecular Property Prediction', focusing on motif-level self-supervision.

tools.name: MXMNet
tools.one_line_profile: Molecular Mechanics-Driven Graph Neural Network
tools.detailed_description: Source code for MXMNet, a graph neural network that integrates molecular mechanics knowledge for predicting molecular properties and structures.

tools.name: Molecular-graph-BERT
tools.one_line_profile: Semi-supervised BERT for molecular graph property prediction
tools.detailed_description: A semi-supervised learning framework utilizing BERT architecture on molecular graphs for property prediction tasks.

tools.name: Meta-MGNN
tools.one_line_profile: Few-Shot Graph Learning for Molecular Property Prediction
tools.detailed_description: Implementation of Meta-MGNN, a meta-learning framework combined with Graph Neural Networks for few-shot molecular property prediction.
